recipes.title: Dhokla
recipes.ingredients: Rice, Chickpea flour, Yogurt, Mustard seeds, Turmeric, Green chilies, Curry leaves
recipes.instructions: Prepare a batter with rice, chickpea flour, and yogurt. Steam the batter, then temper with mustard seeds, turmeric, and curry leaves.

recipes.title: Thepla
recipes.ingredients: Wheat flour, Fenugreek leaves, Cumin, Turmeric, Ginger, Green chilies, Salt
recipes.instructions: Knead wheat flour with fenugreek leaves, cumin, and spices. Roll into flatbreads and cook on a griddle.

recipes.title: Undhiyu
recipes.ingredients: Mixed vegetables, Surti papdi, Sweet potatoes, Methi muthiya, Garlic, Green chilies, Tamarind
recipes.instructions: Cook mixed vegetables with spices, adding muthiya (fried dough) and tamarind for tanginess.

recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
recipes.ingredients: Whole wheat flour, Potatoes, Green chilies, Ginger, Cumin, Coriander, Garam masala
recipes.instructions: Stuff dough with spiced mashed potatoes, roll out and cook on a griddle.

recipes.title: Chole Bhature
recipes.ingredients: Chickpeas, Onion, Tomato, Ginger, Garlic, Cumin, Coriander, Flour, Yogurt
recipes.instructions: Cook chickpeas with onion, tomato, and spices. Serve with fried bhature (puffy bread).

recipes.title: Makki Di Roti & Sarson Da Saag
recipes.ingredients: Maize flour, Mustard greens, Spinach, Ginger, Garlic, Ghee
recipes.instructions: Make roti with maize flour and serve with a mustard greens and spinach curry.

recipes.title: Kathiyawadi Bhakri
recipes.ingredients: Wheat flour, Bajra flour, Cumin, Sesame seeds, Ghee
recipes.instructions: Knead a dough with wheat, bajra flour, cumin, and sesame seeds. Roll into thick flatbreads and cook on a griddle.

recipes.title: Kathiyawadi Sev Tameta
recipes.ingredients: Sev, Tomatoes, Ginger, Garlic, Green chilies, Mustard seeds, Turmeric
recipes.instructions: Cook sev with tomatoes and spices to make a tangy, spicy dish.

recipes.title: Sukhadi
recipes.ingredients: Wheat flour, Ghee, Jaggery, Cardamom
recipes.instructions: Roast wheat flour in ghee, add jaggery and cardamom, and shape into squares.

recipes.title: Chow Mein
recipes.ingredients: Egg noodles, Soy sauce, Vegetables (carrot, bell pepper, cabbage), Garlic, Ginger
recipes.instructions: Stir fry vegetables with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce, then add boiled noodles.

recipes.title: Sweet and Sour Tofu
recipes.ingredients: Tofu, Pineapple, Bell peppers, Soy sauce, Vinegar, Sugar, Ginger, Garlic
recipes.instructions: Fry tofu, then cook with sweet and sour sauce made from pineapple, soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar.

recipes.title: Manchurian
recipes.ingredients: Cauliflower, Ginger, Garlic, Soy sauce, Green chilies, Corn flour
recipes.instructions: Deep fry cauliflower, then toss in a sauce made from soy sauce, garlic, and chili.

recipes.title: Hot and Sour Soup
recipes.ingredients: Mushrooms, Tofu, Vinegar, Soy sauce, Green chilies, Black pepper
recipes.instructions: Boil mushrooms and tofu in broth, then add soy sauce, vinegar, and spices.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Tomato, Onion, Spices
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken, cook with sauce, add spices.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients: Ground beef, Tomatoes, Garlic, Onion, Spaghetti
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef, add tomatoes, garlic, and onions, serve over spaghetti.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.ingredients: Sushi rice, Seaweed, Fish (Salmon/Tuna), Cucumber, Soy sauce
recipes.instructions: Prepare sushi rice, roll with fish and cucumber in seaweed.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: Lettuce, Caesar dressing, Croutons, Parmesan cheese
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons and cheese.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.ingredients: Rice noodles, Shrimp, Tofu, Eggs, Peanuts, Tamarind paste, Lime
recipes.instructions: Stir fry shrimp, tofu, and noodles with tamarind paste, garnish with peanuts and lime.

recipes.title: Pizza Margherita
recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Basil
recipes.instructions: Top dough with sauce, cheese, and basil, bake.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chickpeas, Coconut milk, Tomatoes, Onion, Spices
recipes.instructions: Cook chickpeas with tomatoes, onion, and spices, add coconut milk.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.ingredients: Salmon fillets, Lemon, Garlic, Olive oil, Herbs
recipes.instructions: Marinate salmon with garlic and herbs, grill and serve with lemon.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, Tomatoes, Bell pepper, Onion, Spices
recipes.instructions: Cook vegetables in a pan, crack eggs on top, cook until eggs set.

recipes.title: Vegetable Paella
recipes.ingredients: Rice, Bell peppers, Tomatoes, Peas, Saffron, Olive oil
recipes.instructions: Cook rice with saffron and vegetables, serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Fettuccine, Cream, Parmesan, Garlic
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and pasta, toss with cream and cheese.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.ingredients: Beef tenderloin, Mushrooms, Puff pastry, Egg, Mustard
recipes.instructions: Sear beef, wrap in mushrooms and pastry, bake.

recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.ingredients: Chickpeas, Onion, Garlic, Parsley, Spices, Flour
recipes.instructions: Blend ingredients, shape into balls, fry until crispy.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.ingredients: Arborio rice, Mushrooms, Onion, Parmesan, White wine
recipes.instructions: Cook rice with mushrooms, stir in cheese and wine.

recipes.title: Szechuan Shrimp
recipes.ingredients: Shrimp, Szechuan sauce, Bell peppers, Garlic, Ginger
recipes.instructions: Stir fry shrimp and peppers with Szechuan sauce.

recipes.title: Lamb Curry
recipes.ingredients: Lamb, Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Spices
recipes.instructions: Cook lamb with tomatoes and spices, serve with rice.
